assetRequirements.purpose: main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn
assetRequirements.content_context: A scenic view of Thailand's beaches and cultural landmarks during autumn, showcasing family activities and relaxation.

assetRequirements.purpose: to highlight the autumn experience in Thailand
assetRequirements.content_context: Images of families enjoying the beaches and cultural festivals in Thailand during the autumn season.

usageInstructions.placement: Place according to campaign layout requirements
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Семейный отдых в Тайланде: выгода и приключения осенью!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
emailClientNotes: Large file size may affect loading in some email clients
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected These destination images will showcase the beauty of Thailand's beaches and cultural sites, inviting families to explore and relax.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
